mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_USER (INQUIRY_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, NICKNAME, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_WRITEDATE, INQUIRY_TYPE, P_ID) VALUES (INQ_PERSONAL_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{member_serial}, #{nickname}, #{inquiry_title}, #{inquiry_content}, SYSDATE, #{inquiry_type}, #{p_id})
mapper.select: SELECT U.MEMBER_SERIAL, U.NICKNAME, U.INQUIRY_TITLE, U.INQUIRY_CONTENT, U.INQUIRY_WRITEDATE, U.INQUIRY_TYPE, U.P_ID, U.INQUIRY_SERIAL, A.INQUIRY_RE_SERIAL, A.INQUIRY_RE_CONTENT, A.INQUIRY_RE_DATE, A.ADMIN_NAME FROM INQUIRY_USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN INQUIRY_ADMIN A ON U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = A.INQUIRY_SERIAL WHERE U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = #{inquiry_serial}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM INQUIRY_ADMIN WHERE INQUIRY_SERIAL = #{inquiry_serial }

SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, IQUSER.* FROM(SELECT INQUIRY_SERIAL, MEMBER_SERIAL, NICKNAME, INQUIRY_TITLE, INQUIRY_CONTENT, INQUIRY_WRITEDATE, INQUIRY_TYPE, P_ID FROM INQUIRY_USER WHERE 1=1
AND INQUIRY_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{typeSelect}||'%' ORDER BY INQUIRY_WRITEDATE DESC ) IQUSER ) WHERE RN BETWEEN ${begin} AND ${end}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO INQUIRY_ADMIN (INQUIRY_RE_SERIAL, INQUIRY_SERIAL, INQUIRY_RE_CONTENT, INQUIRY_RE_DATE, ADMIN_NAME) VALUES (INQ_RE_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{inquiry_serial}, #{inquiry_re_content}, SYSDATE, 'admin')
mapper.delete: DELETE U, A FROM INQUIRY_USER AS U INNER JOIN INQUIRY_ADMIN AS A ON U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = A.INQUIRY_SERIAL WHERE U.INQUIRY_SERIAL = #{inquiry_serial }
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM INQUIRY_USER WHERE 1=1 AND INQUIRY_TYPE = #{typeSelect}
